mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PATIENT ( HOSP_NUM, NAME, SEX, AGE, HOSP_TIME, IN_HOSP, OUT_HOSP, DEPT_ID, RECEIVABLE, UPDATE_TIME) VALUES (#{hospNum}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{hospTime}, #{inHosp}, #{outHosp}, #{deptId}, #{receivable}, #{updateTime})
INSERT INTO PATIENT_PAYSERVICE (PATIENT_ID, PAYSERVICE_ID, PAYMENT_ID) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{payserviceId}, #{paymentId})
